# Setup catch as target
set(CATCH_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}" CACHE INTERNAL "")

add_library(Catch INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(Catch INTERFACE "${CATCH_DIR}/..")
